name: Vesper
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 6 Gin,  cl 1.5 Vodka,  cl 0.75 Lillet Blonde

name: Bacardi
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4.5 White rum Bacardi White Rum,  cl 2 Lime juice,  cl 1 Syrup Grenadine

name: Negroni
preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 3 Gin,  cl 3 Campari,  cl 3 Vermouth Sweet red vermouth

name: Rose
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 2 Kirsch,  cl 4 Vermouth Dry vermouth,  3 dashes Strawberry syrup

name: Old Fashioned
preparation: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Whiskey Bourbon or rye whiskey,  2 dashes Angostura Bitters,  1 sugar cube,  Few dashes plain water

name: Tuxedo
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3 Gin Old Tom Gin,  cl 3 Vermouth Dry vermouth,  1/2 bar spoon Maraschino,  1/4 bar spoon Absinthe,  3 dashes Orange Bitters

name: Mojito
preparation: Muddle mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.
ingredients: cl 4 White rum White Cuban Rum,  cl 3 Lime juice,  6 Mint sprigs,  2 teaspoons white sugar,  Soda water

name: Horse's Neck
preparation: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.
ingredients: cl 4 Cognac,  cl 12 Ginger Ale,  Dash of Angostura bitters (optional)

name: Planter's Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Dark rum,  cl 3.5 Orange juice,  cl 3.5 Pineapple juice,  cl 2 Lemon juice,  cl 1 Syrup Grenadine,  cl 1 Syrup Sugar syrup,  3 to 4 dashes Angostura bitters

name: Sea Breeze
preparation: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.
ingredients: cl 4 Vodka,  cl 12 Cranberry juice,  cl 3 Grapefruit juice

name: Pisco Sour
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Pisco,  cl 3 Lemon juice,  cl 2 Syrup Sugar syrup,  1 raw egg white (small egg)

name: Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.
ingredients: cl 1.5 Tequila,  cl 1.5 Vodka,  cl 1.5 White rum,  cl 1.5 Triple Sec,  cl 1.5 Gin,  cl 2.5 Lemon juice,  cl 3.0 Syrup Gomme syrup,  1 dash of Cola

name: Clover Club
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Gin,  cl 1.5 Syrup Raspberry syrup,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice,  Few drops of Egg White

name: Angel Face
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3 Gin,  cl 3 Apricot brandy,  cl 3 Calvados

name: Mimosa
preparation: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: Buck's Fizz is a very similar cocktail but made of two parts champagne to one part orange juice.
ingredients: cl 7.5 Champagne,  cl 7.5 Orange juice

name: Whiskey Sour
garnish: Half an orange slice and cherry
preparation: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Whiskey Bourbon whiskey,  cl 3.0 Lemon juice,  cl 1.5 Syrup Sugar syrup

name: Screwdriver
preparation: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 5 Vodka,  cl 10 Orange juice

name: Cuba Libre
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
ingredients: cl 5 White rum,  cl 12 Cola,  cl 1 Lime juice

name: Manhattan
preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 5 Whiskey Rye whiskey,  cl 2 Vermouth Red vermouth,  1 dash Angostura Bitters

name: Porto Flip
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
ingredients: cl 1.5 Cognac,  cl 4.5 Red Port,  cl 1 Egg yolk

name: Gin Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Gin,  cl 3 Lemon juice,  cl 1 Syrup Sugar syrup,  cl 8 Soda water

name: Espresso Martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 5 Vodka,  cl 1 Coffee liqueur Kahlúa,  Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness),  1 short strong Espresso

name: Margarita
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).
ingredients: cl 3.5 Tequila,  cl 2 Triple Sec Cointreau,  cl 1.5 Lime juice

name: French 75
preparation: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 3 Gin,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice,  2 dashes Sugar syrup,  cl 6 Champagne

name: Yellow Bird
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3 White rum,  cl 1.5 Galliano,  cl 1.5 Triple Sec,  cl 1.5 Lime juice

name: Pina Colada
preparation: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.
ingredients: cl 3 White rum,  cl 9 Pineapple juice,  cl 3 Coconut milk

name: Aviation
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Gin,  cl 1.5 Cherry liqueur Maraschino,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice

name: Bellini
preparation: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)
ingredients: cl 10 Prosecco,  cl 5 Peach puree

name: Grasshopper
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3 Créme liqueur White Créme de Cacao,  cl 3 Créme liqueur Green Créme de Menthe,  cl 3 Cream

name: Tequila Sunrise
preparation: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Tequila,  cl 9 Orange juice,  cl 1.5 Syrup Grenadine

name: Daiquiri
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4.5 White rum,  cl 2.5 Lime juice,  cl 1.5 Syrup Simple syrup

name: Rusty Nail
preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Whiskey Scotch whisky,  cl 2.5 Drambuie

name: B52
preparation: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.
ingredients: cl 2 Coffee liqueur Kahlúa,  cl 2 Cream liqueur Baileys Irish Cream,  cl 2 Triple Sec Grand Marnier

name: Stinger
preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 5 Cognac,  cl 2 Créme liqueur White Créme de Menthe

name: Golden Dream
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 2 Galliano,  cl 2 Triple Sec,  cl 2 Orange juice,  cl 1 Cream

name: God Mother
preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 3.5 Vodka,  cl 3.5 DiSaronno

name: Spritz Veneziano
preparation: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.
ingredients: cl 6 Prosecco,  cl 4 Aperol,  Splash of Soda water

name: Bramble
preparation: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.
ingredients: cl 4 Gin,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice,  cl 1 Syrup Sugar syrup,  cl 1.5 Blackberry liqueur

name: Alexander
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
ingredients: cl 3 Cognac,  cl 3 Créme liqueur Brown Créme de Cacao,  cl 3 Cream

name: Lemon Drop Martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.
ingredients: cl 2.5 Vodka Citron Vodka,  cl 2 Triple Sec,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice

name: French Martini
preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Vodka,  cl 1.5 Raspberry liqueur,  cl 1.5 Pineapple juice

name: Black Russian
preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.
ingredients: cl 5 Vodka,  cl 2 Coffee liqueur

name: Bloody Mary
preparation: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Vodka,  cl 9 Tomato juice,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice,  2 to 3 dashes of Worcestershire Sauce,  Tabasco,  Celery salt,  Pepper

name: Mai-tai
garnish: Pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime wedge
preparation: Shake and strain into highball glass. Serve with straw.
ingredients: cl 4 White rum,  cl 2 Dark rum,  cl 1.5 Triple Sec Orange Curaçao,  cl 1.5 Syrup Orgeat syrup,  cl 1 Lime juice

name: Barracuda
ingredients: cl 4.5 Dark rum Gold rum,  cl 1.5 Galliano,  cl 6 Pineapple juice,  1 dash Lime juice,  Top with Prosecco

name: Sex on the Beach
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
ingredients: cl 4 Vodka,  cl 2 Peach schnapps,  cl 4 Cranberry juice,  cl 4 Orange juice

name: Monkey Gland
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 5 Gin,  cl 3 Orange juice,  2 drops Absinthe,  2 drops Grenadine

name: Derby
preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 6 Gin,  2 drops Peach Bitters,  2 Fresh mint leaves

name: Sidecar
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 5 Cognac,  cl 2 Triple Sec,  cl 2 Lemon juice

name: Irish Coffee
preparation: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.
ingredients: cl 4 Whiskey Irish whiskey,  cl 9 Hot coffee,  cl 3 Cream,  1 teaspoon of brown sugar

name: Sazerac
preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.
ingredients: cl 5 Cognac,  cl 1 Absinthe,  1 sugar cube,  2 dashes Peychaud’s bitters

name: Americano
preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of soda water.
ingredients: cl 3 Campari,  cl 3 Vermouth Red vermouth,  A splash of soda water

name: Singapore Sling
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass.
ingredients: cl 3 Gin,  cl 1.5 Cherry liqueur,  cl 0.75 Triple Sec Cointreau,  cl 0.75 DOM Bénédictine,  cl 12.0 Pineapple juice,  cl 1.5 Lime juice,  cl 1 Syrup Grenadine,  1 dash Angostura bitters

name: French Connection
preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 3.5 Cognac,  cl 3.5 DiSaronno

name: Moscow Mule
preparation: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Vodka,  cl 12 Ginger beer,  cl 0.5 Lime juice,  1 slice lime in a highball glass

name: John Collins
preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)
ingredients: cl 4.5 Gin,  cl 3 Lemon juice,  cl 1.5 Syrup Sugar syrup,  cl 6 Soda water

name: Kir
preparation: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.
ingredients: cl 9 Dry White Wine,  cl 1 Créme liqueur Créme de Cassis

name: Mint Julep
preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.
ingredients: cl 6 Whiskey Bourbon whiskey,  4 fresh mint sprigs,  1 teaspoon powdered sugar,  2 teaspoons water

name: Tommy's Margarita
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Tequila,  cl 1.5 Lime juice,  2 bar spoons of Agave nectar

name: Paradise
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3.5 Gin,  cl 2 Apricot brandy,  cl 1.5 Orange juice

name: Dirty Martini
preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass.
ingredients: cl 6 Vodka,  cl 1 Vermouth Dry vermouth,  cl 1 Olive juice

name: Champagne Cocktail
preparation: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.
ingredients: cl 9 Champagne,  cl 1 Cognac,  2 dashes Angostura Bitters,  1 sugar cube

name: Mary Pickford
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 6 White rum,  cl 1 Cherry liqueur Maraschino,  cl 6 Pineapple juice,  cl 1 Syrup Grenadine

name: Hemingway Special
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a double cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 6 White rum,  cl 4 Grapefruit juice,  cl 1.5 Cherry liqueur Maraschino,  cl 1.5 Lime juice

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Add rum first and top it with ginger beer.
ingredients: cl 6 Dark rum,  cl 10 Ginger beer

name: Ramos Fizz
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Gin,  cl 1.5 Lime juice,  cl 1.5 Lemon juice,  cl 3 Syrup Sugar syrup,  cl 6 Cream,  1 Egg white,  3 dashes Orange flower water,  2 drops Vanilla extract,  Soda water

name: Russian Spring Punch
preparation: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.
ingredients: cl 2.5 Vodka,  cl 2.5 Lemon juice,  cl 1.5 Créme liqueur Créme de Cassis,  cl 1 Syrup Sugar syrup

name: God Father
preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
ingredients: cl 3.5 Whiskey Scotch whisky,  cl 3.5 DiSaronno

name: Cosmopolitan
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4 Vodka Citron Vodka,  cl 1.5 Triple Sec Cointreau,  cl 1.5 Lime juice,  cl 3 Cranberry juice

name: Dry Martini
preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
ingredients: cl 6 Gin,  cl 1 Vermouth Dry vermouth

name: Between the Sheets
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3 White rum,  cl 3 Cognac,  cl 3 Triple Sec,  cl 2 Lemon juice

name: Casino
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4 Gin Old Tom Gin,  cl 1 Cherry liqueur Maraschino,  cl 1 Orange Bitters,  cl 1 Lemon juice

name: Caipirinha
preparation: Place lime and sugar in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).
ingredients: cl 5 Cachaca,  half fresh lime cut into 4 wedges,  2 teaspoon sugar

name: Vampiro
garnish: Lime wedge and a green or red chili
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice.
ingredients: cl 5 Tequila Silver Tequila,  cl 7 Tomato juice,  cl 3 Orange juice,  cl 1 Lime juice,  1 teaspoon clear honey,  Half slice onion finely chopped,  Few slices fresh red hot chili peppers,  Few drops Worcestershire sauce,  Salt

name: Kamikaze
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 3 Vodka,  cl 3 Triple Sec,  cl 3 Lime juice

name: White Lady
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into large cocktail glass.
ingredients: cl 4 Gin,  cl 3 Triple Sec,  cl 2 Lemon juice

name: Harvey Wallbanger
preparation: Build vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top.
ingredients: cl 4.5 Vodka,  cl 1.5 Galliano,  cl 9 Orange juice
